channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：2024 年的总统竞选将由人口不到美国五分之一的七个州决定。@KarlRove 写道：这些战场将获得几乎所有的关注。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: The 2024 presidential race will be decided by seven states with less than a fifth of the U.S. population. These battlegrounds will get almost all the attention, writes @KarlRove. https://t.co/OJHW3vNar8 https://t.co/OJHW3vNar8

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：Arthur M. Diamond 写道：一项旨在减轻 Covid 负担的政府计划反而增加了纳税人和欺诈受害者的负担。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: A government program that intended to reduce the Covid burden instead increased burdens on taxpayers and victims of fraud, writes Arthur M. Diamond https://t.co/gmqlFUkLpW https://t.co/gmqlFUkLpW

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：职责和紧迫性是总统享有广泛刑事起诉豁免权的界限。特别顾问杰克-史密斯（Jack Smith）试图消除一条惯例，@俄亥俄州检察长写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Duty and urgency mark the boundaries of broad presidential immunity from criminal prosecution. Special counsel Jack Smith has sought to erase a line of custom, writes @OhioAG. https://t.co/W4wcIRgVmw https://t.co/W4wcIRgVmw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: Mistral AI、Hugging Face 和其他公司都在打赌，他们可以通过开源技术与 OpenAI 和大型科技公司抗衡，但这可能会导致风险大于收益。
item.description:

item.title: 为了拯救以色列，查克-舒默决定，他必须谴责以色列领导人本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理。"我脑子里想了很多，也挣扎了很久："这对以色列和美以关系来说是正确的吗？"
item.description:

item.title: 无论是含酒精还是不含酒精的饮料，加入鲜艳、果味浓郁的verjus，都能让人惊喜地感受到它的深度和口感。

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登的赌注是，承诺将公共开支提高到 7 万亿美元以上会让选民对总统及其政党感觉更好。然而，@DanHenninger 写道：过度膨胀的山姆大叔可能会适得其反。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Biden bet is that promising to push public spending past $7 trillion will make voters feel better about the president and his party. Overstuffing Uncle Sam, however, may be doing the opposite, writes @DanHenninger. https://t.co/gqkXrpV609

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 影评编剧、导演伊万-森（Ivan Sen）执导的《Limbo》中，男主角西蒙-贝克（Simon Baker）饰演一名调查员，负责调查一起长达 20 年之久的澳大利亚内陆土著女孩失踪案。
item.description:
Review: Writer-director Ivan Sen’s "Limbo" features actor Simon Baker as an investigator reviewing the 20-year-old case of an indigenous girl’s disappearance in the Australian Outback https://t.co/frExmdPUXe https://t.co/frExmdPUXe

item.title: 回顾：在纪录片《威廉-夏特纳：在纪录片《威廉-夏特纳：你可以叫我比尔》（William Shatner: You Can Call Me Bill）中，这位演员回顾了他在电视和无聊电影中的作品、他的人生哲学、他在诗歌和音乐方面的尝试以及他的太空之旅。
item.description:

item.title: 面临联邦腐败指控的参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）表示，他不会参加民主党的初选，但如果他能克服法律问题，将有可能以独立候选人的身份竞选连任
item.description:
Sen. Bob Menendez, who faces federal corruption charges, said he won’t enter the Democratic primary but left open the possibility of a re-election bid as an independent if he overcomes his legal problems https://t.co/KZmlYMSzdK https://t.co/KZmlYMSzdK

item.title: 水原一平（Ippei Mizuhara）被指控从大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）那里窃取了数百万美元，他不仅仅是一名俱乐部翻译。他与大谷翔平的关系越来越密切，几乎控制了他生活的方方面面。
item.description:
Ippei Mizuhara, who is accused of stealing millions of dollars from Shohei Ohtani, was more than just a clubhouse translator. He grew so close to Ohtani that he controlled almost every aspect of his life. https://t.co/lvaUDYKVrs https://t.co/lvaUDYKVrs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: Truth Social 的经营业绩不佳。然而，这可能是唐纳德-特朗普做过的最好的投资。以下是这位前总统如何赚取数十亿美元以及何时能从投资中获利的信息。
item.description:
Truth Social has performed poorly as a business. Yet it could be the best investment Donald Trump has ever made. Here’s how the former president could make billions and when he might be able to profit from his investment. https://t.co/7d3gVPyRar https://t.co/7d3gVPyRar

item.description:

item.title: 马丁-格林菲尔德（Martin Greenfield）于周三去世，他在大屠杀中幸存下来，后来为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）、勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）设计服装。他是美国制造业为何重要的非官方发言人。
item.description:
Martin Greenfield, who died Wednesday, survived the Holocaust and went on to dress Donald Trump, LeBron James and Barack Obama. He was an unofficial spokesman for why American manufacturing matters. https://t.co/zNy3pmSBfe https://t.co/zNy3pmSBfe

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 来自雅卡玛族的语言学家弗吉尼亚-贝弗特（Virginia Beavert）与他人合作编写了第一本萨哈普廷语词典，并建立了教授这种传统上没有文字记载的语言的基础设施。
item.description:
